data.heading: Text composable
data.content: Displays text and follows the recommended Material Design guidelines.

data.heading: Image composable
data.content: Creates a composable that lays out and draws a given Painter class object.

data.heading: Row composable
data.content: A layout composable that places its children in a horizontal sequence.

data.heading: Column composable
data.content: A layout composable that places its children in a vertical sequence.
